answerText: white dwarfs [prompt on dwarfs or dwarf stars][10] Most white dwarfs consist mainly of this element and oxygen. The reignition of thermonuclear fusion in a white dwarf leading to a Type I supernova begins with this element.
heading: ACF Regionals |2015 | Georgia Tech | 4 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Accretion of hydrogen onto these stars leads to an increase in their intensity during a nova. For 10 points each: [10] Name these stellar remnants which also undergo Type IA supernovae. These stars form from red giants that don't turn into neutron stars.
